Flow.description: Captures the data needed for the Kitting team to make decisions and see if the potential is there.
Flow.label: Opportunity [SF]: Kitting Request

recordUpdates.description: push data into fields on kitting page layout

recordUpdates.label: Update Kitting Oppty

fields.fieldText: What are the Customer's pain points/reason to switch?

value.stringValue: Will your customer sign a CDI for both raw materials and finished goods?

fields.name: Number_of_kits_per_outbound_48x40_pallet
fields.fieldText: Number of kits per outbound 48x40 pallet?

fields.name: RequestParametersText
fields.fieldText:
Verify the following requirements apply to the Opportunity


Kitting

  • Must be packaging customer
  • Needs to pull through core sales of $250,000/annually
  • Must run project at least 4x times a year, if not on-going
  • Kitting minimum revenue recommended $50,000-$100,000/annually with 35%+ GTM
  • No Labor Only Programs (must include sale of packaging material in kit)
  • No Vendor Rework Programs

Converting

  • Must be packaging customer
  • Must pull through packaging
  • Must run project at least 4x times a year
  • Converting order minimum is $5,000 with 35%+ GTM
